channel.title: ClientHandler errors
channel.description: Hi! I am editting the old ClientHandler of Hybridscape but it gives these errors when i try to compile it: [code]ClientHandler.java:625: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Bot location: class ClientHandler Bot.log("Registering user " + name + " with pass " + pass); ^ ClientHandler.java:639: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Bot location: class ClientHandler Bot.log("Registration succesful!!"); ^ 2 errors [/code] Could someone fix it for me? Attached the file with my message :)

item.title: ClientHandler errors
item.dc:creator: @sagabmx sagabmx
item.description:
@sagabmx wrote:

Hi!
I am editting the old ClientHandler of Hybridscape but it gives these errors when i try to compile it:

ClientHandler.java:625: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Bot location: class ClientHandler Bot.log("Registering user " + name + " with pass " + pass); ^ ClientHandler.java:639: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Bot location: class ClientHandler Bot.log("Registration succesful!!"); ^ 2 errors
Could someone fix it for me?
Attached the file with my message

Read full topic
